string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: An English rock band that formed in Liverpool in 1960.
An American rock band that formed in Washington in 1987.
An Irish rock band from Dublin that formed in 1976.
Maverick City Music is an American contemporary worship music collective founded by Tony Brown and Jonathan Jay originating from Atlanta.
Elevation Worship is a contemporary worship music collective from Elevation Church in Charlotte, North Carolina.
Gable Price and Friends released their debut EP, The Redding EP, in 2018.
The Afters is an American Christian pop rock band founded by Joshua Havens and Matt Fuqua.
Switchfoot is an American rock band from San Diego, California.
Flyleaf is an American rock band formed in Belton, Texas, in 2002.
Superchick made their debut in 1999 at an Audio Adrenaline concert in front of an audience of 5,000.
BarlowGirl was an American Christian rock and CCM all-female band from Elgin, Illinois.
DC Talk (stylized as dc Talk) is a Christian rap and rock trio.
Newsboys (sometimes stylised as newsboys) are a Christian rock band founded in 1985 in Mooloolaba, Queensland, Australia, by Peter Furler and George Perdikis.
Disciple is an American Christian rock band from Knoxville, Tennessee, formed in 1992.
